content: I think the Tiffany blue ombre cake design would be perfect, and I'll go with a classic vanilla bean flavor. The cake will definitely be a great addition to the dinner. By the way, speaking of gifts, I also got her a gift wrapping paper and a birthday card to go along with the necklace, which was very convenient since the sales associate at Tiffany's helped me pick out the perfect gift and even offered to gift wrap it for me.
